page.name: Attacker's Band
page.description: This item requires a Dragon Amulet. It is a ring which is perfect for the all-out, front assault type of person. It adds to Crit, Bonus  to hit, and endurance as well as slightly boosting the wearer's strength and intelligence!

properties.name: Attacker's Band
properties.description: This item requires a Dragon Amulet. It is a ring which is perfect for the all-out, front assault type of person. It adds to Crit, Bonus  to hit, and endurance as well as slightly boosting the wearer's strength and intelligence!

page.name: The Outcast
page.description: The Mayor has sent you deep into Doomwood to find a powerful necromancer who might have a key to get into the Necropolis.

properties.name: The Outcast
properties.description: The Mayor has sent you deep into Doomwood to find a powerful necromancer who might have a key to get into the Necropolis.
properties.complete: Now that you have Zorbak's student I.D. (even though it looks nothing like you, it's expired and he was expelled) you might be able to get into the Necropolis!
